example.code: PS C:\>(Get-IAMInstanceProfile -InstanceProfileName MyAppInstanceProfile).Roles | Remove-IAMRoleFromInstanceProfile -InstanceProfileName MyAppInstanceProfile PS C:\>Remove-IAMInstanceProfile -InstanceProfileName MyAppInstanceProfile
example.description: This example deletes the EC2 instance profile named MyAppInstanceProfile. The first command detaches any roles from the instance profile, and then the second command deletes the instance profile.
